text: Alicia Martinez Gragera (born September 24, 1975 in Badajoz) is a track and field athlete from Spain. She has a disability: She has cerebral palsy and a T37 type athlete. She raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. She finished third in the 200 meter T34-T37 race. She raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics in Sydney, Australia. == References == Category:Spanish sprinters Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Extremadura
title: Alicia Martinez Gragera
